abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-100}}|{{Summon|Crypt Shambler|2|Ghost}}|{{Ability|[[Life Drain|Holy Life Drain]]|138-362|element=lifedrain}}|{{Ability|[[Life Drain|Distance Life Drain]]|0-80|element=lifedrain}}|{{Ability|[[Drunkenness]]|element=drunk}}|{{Ability|[[Invisible|Invisibility]]|element=invisible}} }}
sounds: I will bring peace to your misguided soul!
You should have joined us when there was time!
Rejoice! You will die in the name of the triangle!
name: Grandfather Tridian
location: Third floor (behind the piano) in [[Cult Cave]] ([[Liberty Bay]]) {{Mapper Coords|126.158|128.13|11|4|text=here}}.
strategy: This boss can be very hard for lower levels because he will do invisible and heal full, a good trick is to fire/energy bomb him in a corner, that way he will be visible almost all the time.
